meanings.sent1: The cateresses prepared delicious food for the party.
meanings.sent2: The cateresses served a variety of dishes at the event.
meanings.sent3: The cateresses accidentally mixed up the dessert and salad orders.
meanings.sent4: The cateresses were the culinary artists of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The cateresses' attention to detail made the meal unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The cateresses were all skilled in the art of cooking.
meanings.sent2: The cateresses' business was booming with orders.
meanings.sent3: The cateresses decided to start a catering company together.
meanings.sent4: The cateresses' teamwork made the event a success.
meanings.sent5: The cateresses' professionalism impressed all the guests.
